Products.name: Skin and Coat
Products.desc: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids, our Salmon Oil supports healthy skin and coat, reduces inflammation, and promotes heart health.

Products.name: Hip and Joint
Products.desc: Our Joint & Hip Syrup is formulated with Calcium & D3  to support joint health and mobility, reduce pain and inflammation, and promote healthy cartilage.

Products.name: Immunity Booster
Products.desc: Our Immunity Booster Syrup is packed with antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals to support a healthy immune system and protect against illness and disease.

Products.name: Minerals and Amino Acids
Products.desc: Our Multivitamins & Minerals Syrup provides a balanced blend of essential vitamins and minerals to support overall health and well-being.

Products.name: Whey Protein - Meal Topper
Products.desc: Our Meal Topper is a delicious and nutritious protein powder that can be sprinkled on top of your pet's food to add extra flavor and nutrition. Made with high-quality proteins, our Meal Topper supports healthy muscles, bones, and tissues.
